programme.desc: Vancouver. The buyers bid on seized items and property at a police auction in Vancouver. Mark is interested in a magnetic drill while Billy and the Martins battle for vintage comics. S1, Ep9

programme.title: Baggage Battles
programme.desc: NYC Transit. The buyers are at the New York City transit auction that contains 14,000 items. Billy and the Martins compete for a Stradivarius violin possibly worth $1 million. S1, Ep10

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: Bull By The Horns. The Wolfpack's quest for complete freedom takes a big step forward with new livestock, including a risky longhorn bull. Noah and his new wife Rhain arrive. S4, Ep9

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: The Buffalo Trail. The Wolfpack seizes an opportunity to stockpile meat with their first-ever buffalo hunt. Noah and Bam are left behind to build a mine-cooled meat locker. S4, Ep10

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: Beware The Bear-Crow. As new predators encroach on the ranch, the Browns devise inventive solutions to defend their livestock. Gabe's long-distance girlfriend makes her first visit. S4, Ep11

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: Mountain Emergency. A medical emergency on the Wolfpack's ranch forces them to be more resourceful. And, Gabe's family are concerned when he makes a hasty leap towards marriage. S4, Ep12

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: Wired For Speed. Andy finds a wire harness to marry his SVO Mustang to a new EcoBoost engine. George cuts an F350 in half to create a single cab short bed diesel pick-up truck. S4, Ep5

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: The Big Red Build. Andy returns a 2010 Dodge Viper to muscle car glory. Then, he fixes up a 1950 fire truck - but money's tight so he gets creative to put Big Red back on the road. S4, Ep6

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: One Bad Barracuda. Andy Cohen turns piles of rusting junk into a money-making machine. Backed up by his team, he chases down deals and adds value to what others throw away. S4, Ep7

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: Hellcuda Unleashed. Andy's Barracuda build keeps hitting setbacks, causing frustration amongst the team. Later, Tommy brings some retro-cool to a junked helicopter. S4, Ep8

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Porsche 914. Mike finds a 914 in a barn, but under the muck he can see a profit in the 70's sports car, so he buys it for a bargain price. Can Edd restore it to a saleable condition? S9, Ep5

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Porsche Boxster. Mike purchases a mouldy Porsche Boxster with seized brakes and a host of other faults, but at 1,000, he can't resist. Can Edd fix it up enough to turn a profit? S10, Ep4

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Porsche 993 Targa. Mike goes in search of what many consider to be the last truly great Porsche, and he finds the cheapest 993 in the country. Can the duo get it back to its best? S11, Ep2

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: 1976 Porsche 912E. Mike seeks out a Porsche 912E. With the help of Edd, they address the years of neglect, while they bring home the horses and return on their investment. S13, Ep12

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: 1977 Porsche 924. Mike takes on a Porsche 924, the first car he ever turned around on the series. Will fixing oil leaks and worn interior be enough earn a profit? S14, Ep12

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: Where The Legend Began. The team has a shocking sighting, only to see the lead slip through their fingers. Then, a ground-breaking tip leads to an unexpected change of plans. S3, Ep7

programme.title: The Undercover Police Scandal: Love and Lies Exposed
programme.desc: A mutual friend introduces Helen and Alison, and they work out that their former partners must have belonged to a Metropolitan Police squad that infiltrated left-wing groups. No-one is interested in their story and both women are forced to move on with their lives. Seven years later, an online post finally unmasks former officer Mark Kennedy, whose undercover name was Mark Stone

programme.title: Emergency Nurses: A&E Stories
programme.desc: Nurses Ben and Chloe treat a seizure patient and a teenage drink driver, nurse Mae sees a toddler with a popcorn issue, and nurse Kia reveals her bodybuilding.

programme.title: Unwind with STV
programme.desc: Daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection

programme.title: Ant & Dec's Limitless Win
programme.desc: Ant and Dec try to help more contestants climb the never-ending money ladder and first up are husband-and-wife team Dan and Sarah, who would like to buy their first home and build an animal sanctuary for their local community. It's then the turn of married couple Nik and Khajal to take on the Limitless Ladder, with Nik hoping to spend his winnings on a purpose-built barbecue shack, but Khajal's not so sure

programme.title: Good Morning Britain
programme.desc: Morning magazine featuring a lively mix of news and current affairs, plus health, entertainment and lifestyle features

programme.title: Lorraine
programme.desc: Early morning chat show presented by Lorraine Kelly, with celebrity interviews, entertainment news, cooking tips, fashion features and musical guests.

programme.title: This Morning
programme.desc: Daily magazine, featuring a mix of celebrity chat, showbusiness news, lifestyle features, topical discussion, health and beauty advice and more

programme.title: Loose Women
programme.desc: Guest panellists engage in topical debate and celebrity interviews from a female perspective

programme.title: ITV Lunchtime News
programme.desc: The key headlines from the day so far

programme.title: STV News and Weather
programme.desc: Including regional weather forecast

programme.title: Celebrity Catchphrase
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts another charity edition of the game show, with Dianne Buswell, Ria Hebden and Neil Morrissey trying to guess the familiar phrases hidden in animated clues. After the first elimination, the two remaining players battle to reach the Super Catchphrase round, where one of them could win 50,000 for the good cause of their choice

programme.title: Jeopardy!
programme.desc: Stephen Fry hosts the quiz in which players are presented with clues in the form of answers and must phrase their responses in the form of a question

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a 10,000 jackpot

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Jay from Newton Aycliffe, Matt from Birkenhead, Brad from Watford and Carla from Edinburgh take on a Chaser. Bradley Walsh guides the contestants through a battle of wits in the hope that they'll go home with thousands of pounds

programme.title: STV News at Six and Weather
programme.desc: Including regional weather forecast

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: A round-up of the day's news headlines and talking points from the UK and around the world

programme.title: World Cup Qualifier
programme.desc: England v Albania (Kick-off 7.45pm). Mark Pougatch presents coverage of both teams' opening Group K match, held at Wembley Stadium. This is Thomas Tuchel's first match as head coach of England and he will be expecting to get off to a winning start in a group that also contains Serbia, Latvia and Andorra. The teams were also in the same qualifying group for the 2022 World Cup, when England overcame the Albanians 2-0 in Tirana and 5-0 here. With analysis from Roy Keane and Ian Wright, and commentary by Sam Matterface and Lee Dixon

programme.title: Long Lost Family: Born Without Trace
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell follow the stories of foundlings as they search for answers about why they were left as babies and try to find their birth families. programme.title: The Undercover Police Scandal: Love and Lies Exposed

programme.title: The Undercover Police Scandal: Love and Lies Exposed
programme.desc: A mutual friend introduces Helen and Alison, and they work out that their former partners must have belonged to a Metropolitan Police squad that infiltrated left-wing groups. No-one is interested in their story and both women are forced to move on with their lives. Seven years later, an online post finally unmasks former officer Mark Kennedy, whose undercover name was Mark Stone

programme.title: Emergency Nurses: A&E Stories

programme.title: Jeopardy!

programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a 10,000 jackpot

programme.title: The Chase

programme.title: World Cup Qualifier
programme.desc: England v Albania (Kick-off 7.45pm). Mark Pougatch presents coverage of both teams' opening Group K match, held at Wembley Stadium. This is Thomas Tuchel's first match as head coach of England and he will be expecting to get off to a winning start in a group that also contains Serbia, Latvia and Andorra. The teams were also in the same qualifying group for the 2022 World Cup, when England overcame the Albanians 2-0 in Tirana and 5-0 here. With analysis from Roy Keane and Ian Wright, and commentary by Sam Matterface and Lee Dixon

programme.title: ITV News at Ten
programme.desc: A fresh perspective on the major stories of the day, featuring national and international news, with reports and analysis from ITV's correspondents

programme.title: Long Lost Family: Born Without Trace
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell follow the stories of foundlings as they search for answers about why they were left as babies and try to find their birth families. Elsewhere, a woman left in a hospital in the 1960s receives surprising news about her birth family

programme.title: Grantchester

programme.desc: Nemesis: The final death throes of the Third Reich described by Laurence Olivier. Hitler retreats to his bunker as Germany crumbles around him and Allied troops arrive in Berlin.
